// how to merge github latest version to self customize repository

git clone https://git.test1.tech/project/A.git 
git checkout -b feature/JSTE-15539-upgrade-to-1.11 
git remote add ssh2_github https://github.com/mscdex/ssh2.git
git fetch ssh2_github 
git checkout -b ssh2_github_v1_11 v1.11.0
git branch 
git checkout feature/JSTE-15539-upgrade-to-1.11 
git merge ssh2_github_v1_11 --allow-unrelated-histories 
git push
